content:
This is doubtless a newbie problem ...
My changes build fine, but I get a failure of "Bash exited with code '1'"
First time round (end of last week and yesterday) I got in a complete mess so I've cleared out the old repository and started with a new clone but I still get the same error. Where do I go next please?
where do you get 'bash exited with code '1'?
ok so you click on the black box, and see:

[java] Error: The spreadsheet /home/ubuntu/agents/01/_work/2/s/source/researchsubject/researchsubject-spreadsheet.xml was committed after editing in excel, but before the build could run after Excel was closed
Hang out the flags - I've got the process working :grinning: - thanks
